item.title: Active Subspaces
item.description: I ran a series of tests and google searches to convert a repository to Python 3 from Python 2. 2to3 was a good starting point but the imports needed a lot of restructuring. Then the other problems were all related to division operations. The default type is now Float, so 1/2 returns 0.5, whereas in Python 2 it returns 0 since the numerator is interpreted as an integer. Drank coffee WAY too late in the evening and converted @DrPaulynomial's #ActiveSubspaces repo to #Python3.
